scripts.build: node scripts/run-bun.mjs install --frozen-lockfile && node scripts/run-bun.mjs run wasm:check-upstream && tsc -b
scripts.test: npm run build && node scripts/run-bun.mjs test $(find packages/*/test packages/sidflow-web/tests/unit integration-tests -name '*.test.ts' -type f 2>/dev/null) --coverage --coverage-reporter=text --coverage-reporter=lcov --exclude='**/*.spec.ts' --exclude='**/tests/e2e/**' --exclude='**/dist/**'
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && node scripts/run-bun.mjs test ./integration-tests/e2e-suite.ts && cd packages/sidflow-web && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run test; TEST_EXIT=$?; cd packages/sidflow-web && npm run build:worklet && npm run test:e2e; PLAYWRIGHT_EXIT=$?; exit $((TEST_EXIT + PLAYWRIGHT_EXIT))
scripts.ci:verify: npm run validate:config && npm run fetch:sample && npm run classify:sample && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:perf: npm run build && cd packages/sidflow-web && npm run test:perf
scripts.test:a11y: npm run build && cd packages/sidflow-web && npm run test:a11y
